# Social Preview Image Specifications

Create a social preview image for GitHub with these specifications:

## Dimensions
- **Size:** 1280 x 640 pixels (2:1 ratio)
- **Format:** PNG

## Design Elements

### Background
- Dark gradient: `#0a0e27` to `#1a1f3a`
- Or solid dark: `#0d1117` (GitHub dark theme)

### Text Content

**Title (Large, Bold):**
```
Devscope
```
Font: Sans-serif, bold, ~120px
Color: `#ffffff` or `#58a6ff` (GitHub blue)

**Subtitle (Medium):**
```
Universal Codebase Intelligence
```
Font: Sans-serif, regular, ~48px
Color: `#c9d1d9` (muted gray)

**Sample Output (Code-style):**
```
Devscope: B · Low risk · Easy onboarding · 0.06s ⚡
```
Font: Monospace, ~40px
Color: `#79c0ff` (light blue)
Background: Semi-transparent dark box with rounded corners

### Optional Elements
- GitHub logo or code icon (subtle, top-left)
- Gradient accent line (bottom)
- Subtle grid pattern in background

## Color Palette
- Primary: `#58a6ff` (GitHub blue)
- Text: `#ffffff`, `#c9d1d9`
- Background: `#0d1117`, `#1a1f3a`
- Accent: `#79c0ff`, `#388bfd`

## Tools
- Figma (free): https://figma.com
- Canva (free templates): https://canva.com
- Photopea (Photoshop alternative): https://photopea.com

## Upload
1. Go to: https://github.com/EhsanAzish80/devscope/settings
2. Scroll to "Social preview"
3. Upload the 1280x640 PNG

## Reference
GitHub's og:image appears on:
- Twitter cards
- Discord/Slack link previews
- GitHub social sharing
- Google search results
